items.name: Bitter Instinct
explicitMods: Reflects (200-300) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
Retaliation Skills become Usable for (50-100)% longer
Damaging Retaliation Skills become Usable every 4 seconds

items.name: Bonemeld
explicitMods: +(1-2) to Level of all Minion Skill Gems
-2% to all Resistances per Minion from your Non-Vaal Skills
(3-4)% increased Defences per Minion from your Non-Vaal Skills
Minions gain added Resistances equal to 50% of your Resistances
(Armour, Evasion Rating and Energy Shield are the standard Defences)

items.name: Cowards' Wail
explicitMods: Totems which would be killed by Enemies become Spectral Totems for 8 seconds instead
Skills used by Spectral Totems deal (40-50)% less Damage

(Spectral Totems are intangible, untargetable, and undamageable, have 1 maximum Life, and cannot Taunt enemies. They are no longer counted as Summoned Totems, but modifiers that affect Totems also affect Spectral Totems)
(Cannot Evade enemy Attacks. Cannot be Stunned)

items.name: Festering Resentment
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Block, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
+(30-45)% Chance to Block Spell Damage while in Off Hand
All Damage with Triggered Spells can Poison

items.name: Hand of the Lords
explicitMods: You cannot Cast Socketed Hex Curse SkillsInflict Socketed Hexes on Enemies that trigger your Traps
Grants Level 30 Will of the Lords Skill
Can have up to (3-5) additional Traps placed at a time

items.name: Haunting Memories
explicitMods: (50-100)% of Suppressed Spell Damage taken bypasses Energy Shield
(50-100)% of Suppressed Spell Damage taken Recouped as Energy Shield
(40% of Damage from Suppressed Hits and Ailments they inflict is prevented)
(Only Damage from Hits can be Recouped, over 4 seconds following the Hit)

items.name: Jiquani's Potential
implicitMods: +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: 1 to (31-53) Spell Lightning Damage per 10 Intelligence
(Removes all mana. 10% more maximum Life. Skills Cost Life instead of Mana. Skills Reserve Life instead of Mana)

items.name: Lost Unity
explicitMods: Grants Level 30 Herald of the Hive Skill

items.name: Refuge in Isolation
explicitMods: (15-30)% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage
Physical Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky
(Unlucky things are rolled twice and the worst result used)

items.name: Rigwald's Hunt
explicitMods: Minions have 1% chance to deal Double Damage per Fortification on you
Increases and Reductions to Minion Maximum Life also apply to you at 15% of their value

items.name: The Caged Mammoth
explicitMods: Adds (6-10) to (16-22) Physical Damage to Attacks
5% less Damage taken per 5 Rage, up to a maximum of 30%
(Every Rage grants 1% more Attack Damage. Maximum Rage is 30. Lose 10 Rage per second if you have not been Hit or gained Rage in the last 2 seconds)

items.name: The Golden Charlatan
explicitMods: Critical Strikes with this Weapon do not deal extra Damage
Gain a random Shrine Buff for 30 seconds when you Kill a Rare or Unique Enemy

items.name: The Grey Wind
explicitMods: Attacks with this Weapon have Added Fire Damage equal to (8-12)% of Player's Maximum Life
Each Rage also grants +2% to Fire Damage Over Time Multiplier
Nearby Enemies have Fire Exposure while at maximum Rage
(Fire Exposure applies -10% to Fire Resistance for 4 seconds)
(Every Rage grants 1% more Attack Damage. Maximum Rage is 30. Lose 10 Rage per second if you have not been Hit or gained Rage in the last 2 seconds)

items.name: The Hallowed Monarch
explicitMods: Link Skills can target Damageable Minions
Your Linked Minions take (65-75)% less Damage
On Killing a Rare monster, a random Linked Minion gains its Modifiers for 60 seconds

items.name: The Monastery Bell
explicitMods: Count as Blocking Attack Damage from the first target Hit with each Shield Attack
(Unlucky things are rolled twice and the worst result used)

items.name: The Sundered Will
implicitMods: +2% to maximum Chaos ResistanceCannot roll Modifiers of Non-Chaos Damage Types
explicitMods: (20-30)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
Increases and Reductions to Chaos Damage also apply to Effect ofAuras from Chaos Skills at (10-15)% of their value, up to a maximum of 150%

items.name: The Unseen Hue
explicitMods: Hits with Prismatic Skills always Scorch
(Ailments that do not deal Damage are Scorched, Chilled, Frozen, Brittle, Shocked, and Sapped)
(Scorched Enemies have their Elemental Resistances lowered by up to 30%, based on the Fire Damage of the Hit, for 4 seconds)

items.name: The Will of Esh
implicitMods: +2% to maximum Lightning ResistanceCannot roll Modifiers of Non-Lightning Damage Types
explicitMods: (20-30)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
Increases and Reductions to Lightning Damage also apply to Effect ofAuras from Lightning Skills at (10-15)% of their value, up to a maximum of 150%

items.name: The Will of Tul
implicitMods: +2% to maximum Cold ResistanceCannot roll Modifiers of Non-Cold Damage Types
explicitMods: (20-30)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
Increases and Reductions to Cold Damage also apply to Effect ofAuras from Cold Skills at (10-15)% of their value, up to a maximum of 150%

items.name: The Will of Uul-Netol
implicitMods: 3% additional Physical Damage ReductionCannot roll Modifiers of Non-Physical Damage Types
explicitMods: (20-30)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
Increases and Reductions to Physical Damage also apply to Effect ofAuras from Physical Skills at (10-15)% of their value, up to a maximum of 150%

items.name: The Will of Xoph
implicitMods: +2% to maximum Fire ResistanceCannot roll Modifiers of Non-Fire Damage Types
explicitMods: (20-30)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
Increases and Reductions to Fire Damage also apply to Effect ofAuras from Fire Skills at (10-15)% of their value, up to a maximum of 150%

items.name: Unlight Extant
explicitMods: +1 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
Chaos Skills inflict up to 15 Withered Debuffs on Hit for (5-7) seconds
Cannot Inflict Wither on targets that are not on Full Life
(Withered applies 6% increased Chaos Damage Taken, and can be inflicted up to 15 times)

items.name: Wellwater Phylactery
explicitMods: Starts Energy Shield Recharge when Used
Energy Shield Recharge is not delayed by Damage during Effect

items.name: Wing of the Wyvern
implicitMods: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Spell when a Hit from thisWeapon Freezes a Target, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
(Freeze lowers Enemy Action Speed to zero, preventing them from acting. Duration is based on the Cold Damage of the Hit)
(Gain Added Spell Damage equal to the Damage of your Main Hand Weapon)

items.name: Woespike
implicitMods: Adds (3-4) to (10-14) Physical Damage to Attacks
explicitMods: Adds (8-12) to (18-24) Physical Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
(45-60)% chance on Melee Hit for the Strongest Impale on target to last for 1 additional Hit
(When an Impaled enemy is hit, the Impale reflects 10% of the physical damage of the Impaling hit to that enemy. Impale lasts for 5 hits or 8 seconds)
